meet a mascot character: The gang (Neuro, Evil, BTMC, and Chrchie) meet one of the mascot characters in Disneyland
buy stuff at gift shop: The gang (Neuro, Evil, BTMC, and Chrchie) buy something from a gift shop. Pretty much a free space to be honest
buy food or drink: The gang (Neuro, Evil, BTMC, and Chrchie) buy food or drink at any point
the gang enters toontown: The gang (Neuro, Evil, BTMC, and Chrchie) enter Toontown
the gang enters star wars zone: The gang (Neuro, Evil, BTMC, and Chrchie) enter the Star Wars zone
the gang enters tomorrowland: The gang (Neuro, Evil, BTMC, and Chrchie) enter Tomorrowland
the gang ride the haunted mansion: The gang (Neuro, Evil, BTMC, and Chrchie) ride the Haunted Mansion
the gang ride thunder mountain: The gang (Neuro, Evil, BTMC, and Chrchie) ride Thunder Mountain
the gang use disney transport: The gang (Neuro, Evil, BTMC, and Chrchie) ride any kind of Disney transportation (Disney railroad, Monorail, ETC)
